main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Las Vegas, Nevada on July 22, 1968.
interesting points: The sighting involved 1 object observed visually for a brief duration,The course of the object was noted as 330.0 degrees,The report was part of Project Blue Book by the U.S. Air Force,There was no photographic evidence or physical evidence associated with the report,The observation was considered insufficient for identification according to the Air Force.
witness description: observations from the general public and evaluated by the Air Force
